top_suggestions.title: Inside Out
top_suggestions.description: After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school.

top_suggestions.title: Up
top_suggestions.description: 78-year-old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his house equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.

top_suggestions.title: A Horse for Christmas
top_suggestions.description: After being estranged since her mother's death in the 9/11 attacks, both daughter and father must work together to re-establish their relationship.

top_suggestions.title: Free Birds
top_suggestions.description: Two turkeys from opposite sides of the tracks must put aside their differences and team up to travel back in time to change the course of history, and get Turkeys off the Thanksgiving menu for good.

top_suggestions.title: Big Hero 6
top_suggestions.description: A special bond develops between plus-sized inflatable robot Baymax and prodigy Hiro Hamada, who together team up with a group of friends to form a band of high-tech heroes.

top_suggestions.title: Out of the Furnace
top_suggestions.description: When Rodney Baze mysteriously disappears and law enforcement doesn't follow through fast enough, his older brother Russell takes matters into his own hands to find justice.

top_suggestions.title: TMNT
top_suggestions.description: When the world is threatened by an ancient evil, the four adolescent turtles must reunite and overcome their faults in order to stand against it.

top_suggestions.title: From Straight A's to XXX
top_suggestions.description: In order to pay her college tuition, a young woman turns to the adult film industry and must balance her personal life with a new life as porn star Belle Knox.

top_suggestions.title: The Rugrats Movie
top_suggestions.description: The babies gets lost in the forest after Tommy Pickles gets a new baby brother.

top_suggestions.title: Iron Man 2
top_suggestions.description: With the world now aware of his identity as Iron Man, Tony Stark must contend with both his declining health and a vengeful mad man with ties to his father's legacy.

top_suggestions.title: Iron Man 3
top_suggestions.description: When Tony Stark's world is torn apart by a formidable terrorist called the Mandarin, he starts an odyssey of rebuilding and retribution.

top_suggestions.title: Avengers: Age of Ultron
top_suggestions.description: When Tony Stark and Bruce Banner try to jump-start a dormant peacekeeping program called Ultron, things go horribly wrong and it's up to Earth's mightiest heroes to stop the villainous Ultron from enacting his terrible plan.

top_suggestions.title: Iron Man
top_suggestions.description: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.

top_suggestions.title: The Avengers
top_suggestions.description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

top_suggestions.title: Captain America: Civil War
top_suggestions.description: Political involvement in the Avengers' affairs causes a rift between Captain America and Iron Man.

top_suggestions.title: House of the Dragon
top_suggestions.description: An internal succession war within House Targaryen at the height of its power, 172 years before the birth of Daenerys Targaryen.

top_suggestions.title: The Heart of Me
top_suggestions.description: 1930's London. Two sisters - Madeleine and Dinah - One marries Rickie, the other falls in love with him. He begins an affair which is to have repercussions throughout their lives.
